TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExtenderControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides UI support for working with extender controls at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ExtenderControlDesigner class enables you to interact with extender controls on the page at design time in an IDE such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. Only control developers and IDE developers have to interact with this class directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this [{1}](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) references. This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the standard HTML rendering of an extender control at design time, which includes type and ID information.
Docs.returns: The design-time HTML rendering of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

Docs.param: A component of type that implements the interface.
Docs.summary: Initializes the specified component and adds it to the component change service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed

Docs.param: A dictionary that contains the properties for the control.
Docs.summary: Adjusts the items listed in the properties grid for the control.
Gets a value that indicates whether the current control is displayed on the design surface so it can be selected and its properties can be edited.
Docs.value: if the current control is displayed; otherwise, .
